about_the_game:
Guide hapless knights to a hungry treasure chest mimic by placing directional tiles, springs, and boxes to avoid obstacles and enemies getting in the way of the knights and their treasure.

100 challenging levels with fun cut scenes, 4 different knights with different personalities, a great soundtrack, and all the puns you can tolerate.

A collaboration between Rigg'd Games and Lowtek Games.
detailed_description:
Guide hapless knights to a hungry treasure chest mimic by placing directional tiles, springs, and boxes to avoid obstacles and enemies getting in the way of the knights and their treasure.

100 challenging levels with fun cut scenes, 4 different knights with different personalities, a great soundtrack, and all the puns you can tolerate.

A collaboration between Rigg'd Games and Lowtek Games.

linux_requirements.minimum:
Minimum:
  • OS: Ubuntu
  • Processor: Intel Core2 Duo E8400, 3.0GHz or AMD Athlon 64 X2 6000+, 3.0GHz or higher
  • Memory: 4 GB RAM
  • Graphics: Geforce 9600 GT or AMD HD 3870 512MB or higher
  • Storage: 200 MB available space

mac_requirements.minimum:
Minimum:
  • OS: macOS 10.12 (Sierra) or later
  • Processor: Intel Core i5 or equivalent with SSE2 instruction set support
  • Memory: 4 GB RAM
  • Graphics: OpenGL 3.3 compatible
  • Storage: 200 MB available space

name: Chew Chew Mimic

pc_requirements.minimum:
Minimum:
  • OS *: Windows 7 (SP1+) and Windows 10
  • Processor: x86, x64 architecture with SSE2 instruction set support
  • Memory: 4 GB RAM
  • Graphics: DX10, DX11, DX12 capable
  • DirectX: Version 10
  • Storage: 200 MB available space

short_description: 100 challenging levels with fun cut scenes, 4 different knights with different personalities, a great soundtrack, and all the puns you can tolerate.
